sn22.100:4.3: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ.
sn22.100:4.4: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, sā gaddulabaddho daḷhe khīle vā thambhe vā upanibaddho.
sn22.100:4.5: So gacchati cepi tameva khīlaṃ vā thambhaṃ vā upagacchati;
sn22.100:4.6: tiṭṭhati cepi tameva khīlaṃ vā thambhaṃ vā upatiṭṭhati;
sn22.100:4.7: nisīdati cepi tameva khīlaṃ vā thambhaṃ vā upanisīdati;
sn22.100:4.8: nipajjati cepi tameva khīlaṃ vā thambhaṃ vā upanipajjati.
sn22.100:4.9: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano rūpaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.100:4.13: viññāṇaṃ ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
sn22.100:4.14: So gacchati cepi ime pañcupādānakkhandhe upagacchati;
sn22.100:4.18: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, abhikkhaṇaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ:
sn22.100:5.1: Diṭṭhaṃ vo, bhikkhave, caraṇaṃ nāma cittan”ti?
sn22.100:5.3: “Tampi kho, bhikkhave, caraṇaṃ nāma cittaṃ citteneva cittitaṃ.
sn22.100:5.4: Tenapi kho, bhikkhave, caraṇena cittena cittaññeva cittataraṃ.
sn22.100:5.5: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, abhikkhaṇaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ:
sn22.100:6.1: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekanikāyampi samanupassāmi evaṃ cittaṃ.
sn22.100:6.2: Yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā pāṇā, tepi kho, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā pāṇā citteneva cittitā, tehipi kho, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatehi pāṇehi cittaññeva cittataraṃ.
sn22.100:6.3: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, abhikkhaṇaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ:
sn22.100:7.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, rajako vā cittakārako vā rajanāya vā lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjiṭṭhāya vā suparimaṭṭhe phalake vā bhittiyā vā dussapaṭṭe vā itthirūpaṃ vā purisarūpaṃ vā abhinimmineyya sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ;
sn22.100:7.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano rūpaññeva abhinibbattento abhinibbatteti, vedanaññeva … pe …
sn22.100:7.6: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
